title: UI view
content: What has happened to my user interface? Two days ago my list of emails was on the left, my reading pane beside that on the right. Now I have a full page reading pane, and the email list is in a header bar across the top below the menu bar, with tiny little tabs that describe nothing. My view is set at classic [don't recall ever touching view options], but all the options are greyed out, so that I cannot alter anything. My folders have disappeared as well! Why can't things just be left alone? I don't need a heap of convoluted functions, just a basic mail system.
creator: theoatteejae

title: Thunderbird Accounts Will Not Connect to Gmail.
content:
Using TB 115.8.1 on Windows 10 Pro.

I just recovered a TB backup file to the latest TB. I have two existing accounts and neither will connect to gmail (as they once did). Account 1 shows nothing in the saved login window and I can find no way to create the login data and password to connect to gmail. Account 2 does have login/password data in the saved login window, and it is the correct gmail password. Neither of these account will connect to gmail and attempts to will produce unable to connect warnings and offer to update passwords. Inserting the password in this utility does not lead to a connection.

How do I repair these accounts to connect to gmail?

Ken
creator: kik.base

title: THUNDERBIRD email does not show download activity
content: THUNDERBIRD email does not show download activity. Can't tell if there are no messages available or if there is a problem with the server. 115.8.1 64 bit on Linux Mint. Is there a setting that needs to be toggled ?

title: Autentizace odesílatele
content:
Dobrý den, pokud přes Thunderbird ze svého účtu "vladimir.hert@tiscali.cz" odesílám zprávu příjemci s účtem xxx@gmail.com, email není doručen a zpět dostanu zprávu, že můj účet není autentizován:

'''''''X-Postfix-Sender: rfc822; vladimir.hert@tiscali.cz Arrival-Date: Fri, 15 Mar 2024 08:29:07 +0100 (CET)

Final-Recipient: rfc822; vlada.hert@gmail.com Original-Recipient: rfc822;vlada.hert@gmail.com Action: failed Status: 5.7.26 Remote-MTA: dns; gmail-smtp-in.l.google.com Diagnostic-Code: smtp; 550-5.7.26 This mail has been blocked because the sender 

   is unauthenticated. 550-5.7.26 Gmail requires all senders to authenticate    with either SPF or DKIM. 550-5.7.26  550-5.7.26  Authentication results:    550-5.7.26  DKIM = did not pass 550-5.7.26  SPF [tiscali.cz] with ip:    [194.228.41.112] = did not pass 550-5.7.26  550-5.7.26  For instructions on    setting up authentication, go to 550 5.7.26    https://support.google.com/mail/answer/81126#authentication    b14-20020adfee8e000000b0033ec9d7d6a3si1293297wro.27 - gsmtp

''''''' Děkuji za podporu, jak tento problém vyřešit.
creator: vlada.hert

title: Subfolders
content:
when I go to a sub-folder it shows me all emails in that folder BUT when I open one it opens them all however many emails are in that sub-folder. How can I restrict the opening to the single email I wish to inspect?

DE Watson

title: Thunderbird asks me to log in to a adeleted account
content:
Hello,

I have been using Thunderbird for some time and it has served me well. I used it to manage my gmail accounts with encryption and so on.

Recently I have deleted one of my gmail accounts and when I launch it Thunderbird asks me to log in to that account. "Sign in to continue to Mozilla Thunderbird Email" And I am supposed to enter my email.

I have checked the account settings: the old account (let's call it old@gmail.com) is no longer there. I have also removed the outgoing SMTP server for the old account.

I do not know how to stop the app from asking me to log in to an nonexistent account.
creator: firefox2737

title: Le etichette non mantengono l'ordine che viene impostato
content:
Sto installando su un nuovo pc ex novo, copiando manualmente le impostazioni (non voglio copiare proprio tutto). Tuttavia sto cercando di mantenere l'ordine delle etichette: dopo le prime 5 ho inserito altre etichette, nell'ordine BOT AttesaConferma AttesaInfo Personale

Quando provo, però, mi sposta Bot dietro alle Attese. Se lo rinomino come Abot rimane dietro Se scrivo etichette "mistero" e "test" vengono messe in ordine alfabetico....

Per ottenere l'ordine voluto ho dovuto rinominare le etichette messe dal suo ordinamento misterioso.

Problema aggirato, ma comportamento misterioso
creator: filippo.montano

title: Não encontro o painel avançado
content: Ola bom dia tudo bem? Peço humildemente que me ajudem a conseguir encontrar a barra de painel avançado do thudenbird pois o mesmo não encontro, pois estou precisando ativa a barra de pesquisa global, pois a barra que tenho ativada spó consegue pesquisar e-mail´s estou precisando da barra de pesquisa global para pesquisar uma frase ou palavra chave relacionado a laudo técnico e não consigo faze-lo sem a barra de pesquisa global!
creator: negocioseprofissoes

title: Error comando STAT
content: Buenos días. Tenemos en la empresa varios equipos, todos con thunderbird y nos pasa de vez en cuando en algunos equipos que nos sale el error " El comando STAT no se completo con éxito. Error al obtener el número de mensajes y sus tamaños. El servidor de correo pop.gmail.com respondio: [AUTH] invalid credentials." y ya no se descargan los correos en esa cuenta En todos los ordenadores mínimo tengo dos cuentas de correo y en algunos hasta 6 cuentas de correo. Casi todas las cuentas están con pop. Para quitar el error, entro en Herramientas -> Ajustes -> Privacidad y Seguridad -> Contraseñas -> Contraseñas guardadas. Ahí elijo la cuenta que falla, elimino la que está fallando y luego me pide google que vuelva a meter la clave y ya funciona. El problema es que en algunos ordenadores me salta muy a menudo y para el usuario es una pesadilla. Sabéis de que puede ser??? Muchas gracias por todo. Un saludo.
creator: rjerez

title: notification about new message
content:
I am having a problem with Thunderbird version 115.8.1 (64-bit). I use a message filter to sort messages into specific folders. When I receive messages, I do not see a notification near the clock in Windows. The corresponding menu item in Thunderbird settings is enabled. However, a new message mark appears and disappears on the Thunderbird icon, and the notification sound plays.

Here are some additional details:

  • I am using Windows 10.
  • I have tried restarting Thunderbird and my computer.
  • I have tried disabling and re-enabling the notification settings in Thunderbird.
  • I used the Mailbox Alert add-on (https://addons.thunderbird.net/uk/thunderbird/addon/mailbox-alert/?src=search), but the author of this add-on has stopped supporting it.

I am not sure what else to try. Can you please help me?

title: Thunderbird Search folder bug/oversight. Selecting "Mark Folder Read" marks all email in root folder as read, not just the filtered emails
content:
I had a Search Folder as a filter for a mailbox inbox. I had about 20 unread messages in my inbox and about 5 unread messages in the search folder. When right-clicking the search folder and then Selecting "Mark Folder Read", it not only marked the emails in the search folder as read but also all the unread email files in the inbox it was filtering to.

This is not the behaviour I was expecting.

content:
I have a Google account without a Gmail address. I use my Google contacts account as a secondary file for little-used contacts. I want to be able to access these contacts in Thunderbird but offers no way to access Google accounts that don't have a Gmail address.

I will not set up a Gmail address just to be able to use Thunderbird for this handful of contacts -- there are other clients that don't give me this guff.

Somebody please tell me there is a workaround that doesn't involve copying dead contacts into Thunderbird every time I shuffle my address books.

title: Restore lost Thunder Bird contact (card book) from iphone?
content:
I recently deleted one of the empty sub folders in my "Contact" list. "All" my contacts (and folders) went away in the Cardbook! I tried to restore from my "iphone", icloud account which worked last time I did this in 2021 but not this time. icloud says it did the "Restore" but there is nothing in the contact list yet. icloud said it might take 24 hrs to show but it has been almost 2 days now and still nothing. I am not very computer or Mozilla savy I hate to say so that is the extent of what I can figure out to do.

In a tab, "Address Book" there are a bunch of addresses that were 'Collected' but most of those I don't recognize and don't know where they came from, for what that is worth. I have the latest Thunderbird Version on the computer. I have all the "missing contacts" in my iphone which is the only place this info is left. For whatever reason, I can't get it restored this time!

I hope I have given enough info to help? Thank you for any assistance you can give me!

Al
creator: astrauss1782

title: Message Filter Missing from Filter List but Found Active in Profile Folder
content:
I created many filters to manage my incoming emails.

When I was going to delete one of my folders, a message popped up that all associated filters to that folder will be disabled. I pressed OK.

I then returned the folder back to its spot from the trash bin because I wanted to see that filter and delete it first before deleting the folder.

I went into the Message Filter dialogue window where all the message filters are listed and could not find any filters that are connected to that folder. Also, I have not deleted any filters before this, so that filter affecting that folder I was going to delete should still be listed there.

Next, I went into my profile for Thunderbird to find a "msgFilterRules.dat" file that contained the data for the filter and showed it was active, yet in Thunderbird Message Filter list, that filter is not showing at all.

Note: These filters and emails I have stored in Thunderbird was moved from my old computer to my new one last year, so this may have something to do with it.

Here are my questions

1/ Why is this filter still existing and showing as active in the DAT file, where it does not show at all in the Message Filter dialogue window in Thunderbird?

2/ What do I need to do to make this filter visible in Thunderbird Message Filter list?

2/ What steps do I need to do to ensure filters like this are removed, deleted and not detected by Thunderbird anymore?

Thanks
creator: Mark2012

creator: japgreengoose

title: Thunderbird keeps erasing emails that where recovered using the outlook mail in browser
content:
I seem to accidentally have deleted some mails which then got purged during compacting. Outlook (which i use from the browser since i'm only on Linux) offers to restore the emails, but when i do that, they get immediately erased again by thunderbird, i've tried several workarounds like copying them to another folder first, marking them as unread etc. Nothing helps. I even installed another email program (bluemail), where the mails where not erased immediately, i could read them in the folder to which they were restored, and i moved them around to maybe fool thunderbird, but to no avail, thunderbird keeps deleting them.

I wonder where thunderbird stored the information that the mails should be deleted, and if there is a way to remove that information. I suppose that would also help with another problem i have, that calendar entries from outlook (which it seems to handle using special email item) are disappearing because these mails were also marked as being deleted, or something similar.

Any ideas? If i can't get around this, i may have to stop using thunderbird, which would really be a pity because everything else reallly runs smoothly for me.
creator: bkjawbone

title: Window too large for screen
content:
When doing somethings in Thunderbird, like setting up or changing message filters, a new window appears on the screen with the options. However this window (and others like it) are often bigger than the screen size. (I use an old 1280x1024 screen as I am sight impaired, but even ona full size screen this can happen.)

The problem is that these windows are not adjustable in size. If the button you require is off thee screen. it is not possible to click on it. This makes configuration very hard, especially if it is the Submit button.

Is there any easy solution? There are many times when this can happen and adjusting the default text size at the system level does not help. When the window displayed is too large and you cannot shrink it or move it enough to display the buttons you want.

Thanks for any help.
creator: lordjohn
